name: Corruption
description:
Are You Ruthless Enough to Survive in a Corrupt World?

You're the victim of a frame-up, the chief suspect in an insider-trading scandal. To clear yourself, you'll have to be more ruthless, more devious than your enemies...

Because the name of the game is Corruption. It's a battle of wits and wills like nothing else you've ever played. With extraordinary graphics that reflect the financial world and underworld of London ... over 15 characters in everyday language ... and a plot that will test your skills to the max.
